text: The Housing Assistance Fund established by § 42-3403.07, shall be administered and managed by the Office of the Tenant Advocate.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-181, see notes following § 42-3531.01.

Effective Dates

Section 5 of D.C. Law 16-181 provides: "Section 2 through 4 shall apply as of October 1, 2007."

DC CODE § 42-3531.09

Current through December 11, 2012
